game_core.manager module

class bubble_trouble_ai_competition.game_core.manager.GameManager(ais_dir_path: str, fps: int = 30)

Bases: object

Will manage the game objects, main loop and logic.

__init__(ais_dir_path: str, fps: int = 30)

Initializes the game manager.

Args:

fps (int): The frames per second to run the game at. ais_dir_path (str): The path to the directory containing the ais.

load_ais(ais_dir_path: str)

Load the ais from the given directory.

Args:

ais_dir_path (str): The path to the directory containing the ais.

Raises:

CantLoadBotException: If a bot can’t be loaded.

print_ais()

Calls the AI’s talk method. Just for testing to see if the ais are loaded correctly.

run_game()

Run the main game loop.

Module contents

Module for handling the core game mechanics.
